text: 3.9: 1 T 1.4; 2 T 2.14-16; 2.23; Ta 1.14Ndu khuarar mba fhura shɨshɨgap tamtam buni nzuai gumgi bunin rɨgɨ thari. Mba gumgi, mbe fhura ntari vuzvugap, wari wo nzɨgi zɨri ga nzuav daai buni gum, Moses suaŋgi tɨvi ndɨɨri, mbe fhura nta nzuav wari daav, wari ga vhegap wari shogi. Nza kaŋgi, mba khesharigi buni nzan kurarim, nza tɨvir vhuuiŋ zɨn ŋgɨgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
